messages.message: Hi team. When using AIHub on Excel documents, the provenance / sources provides only the Page number ( Sheet I guess ) . Adding the row number(s) would be super useful.

Hi Cyrille
It looks like this information in text form ? Then we have provenance currently at Page level.
For native table content, we are shortly adding provenance for sheet level and table boundaries.
I m using previous RFP answers to answer a new one. So they are mainly massive Excel sheets with a lot of text :confused: . So I m not sure it will be useful for that use case.
Ah ok, if possible can you share the excel ?
